page.title: 15MEDIA AROUND OSSINGTON.
page.content: There is little excuse for being ill informed in this enlightened age. Most, if not all homes are equipped with{radio}and{television}which keep us up to date with both{local}and {worldwide news.}At the flick of a switch we can be either entertained or informed.{Video recorders}are gaining popularity and attached to a television set allow programmes to be recorded automatically when it is not convenient to pay attention to them at the time of transmission. Local and national{newspapers}and {magazines}are delivered daily if required, and with them comes the opportunity to take part in quizzes and {competitions}sometimes with a {financial incentive.}The mobile library visits the area fortnightly.
